welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Biberist, Switzerland! Nestled in the beautiful countryside of Solothurn, our charming city is known for its historic architecture and tranquil atmosphere. We invite you to explore and experience all that Biberist has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
